attributes.action: Create a national teacher application form.
attributes.additional_details: To support the setting up of a myjobengland to help remove the unnecessary workload associated with applying for a teaching post. The repetition of typing the same details can be removed by a more streamlined approach.
attributes.background:
Support the introduction of a national teacher application form which all schools in England agree to use. 

This would be an equivalent platform to myjobscotland forming myjobengland.
